ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch herbes de Provence, or to taste
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed
2 heavy clay bricks, wrapped tightly in aluminum foil

cookingTips: Butterfly the chicken by removing the backbone and flattening it for even cooking
Use a cast iron skillet for even heat distribution and better browning
The brick method creates crispy skin while keeping meat juicy; monitor temperature to avoid burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What does cooking under a brick accomplish that you can't achieve with other roasting methods?
